dialog.text: The majority of the screen is made up of the sky. There is a small mountain ridge that spans the plain. There is a small grassy field
Does the grass field span the whole picture at the bottom?
Yes. The sky is also very cloudy
Are there any peaks in the mountains?
No. The clouds cover the peak of the mountain. It is more of a mountain ridge than a singular mountain.
Is there any water in the picture?
There is no water. There is also a very small grouping of trees on the left below the mountains and above the grass
Are there any other plants or trees in the picture?
No. I took my first peek. The mountain ridge needs to be lower in height. The sky also needs to have well-defined clouds
How big are the clouds?
fairly large. The sky is only very clear in the top left corner, the rest is filled with clouds
Is there anything I should add to the grass area?
The grassy area is fine. Add a small ridge line of hill underneath the mountain ridge.
Do the hills go behind the trees on the right or do the hills stop at the trees?
The hills go behind the trees. I took my final peek. The drawing is very close, do not change too much. The mountain ridge could still be a little shorter.
Okay I fixed it. Anything else?
No, there is nothing else
Okay great
Are you done then?
yes
